\newcommand{\algdesc}[8]{
\section{#1}\bigskip

\textbf{Algorithm name:} #2 \bigskip

\textbf{Summary:} #3 \bigskip

\begin{tabular}{p{2cm} p{2cm} p{8cm}}
	\multicolumn{3}{l}{\textbf{Inputs:}}\\
	\hline
	#4
\end{tabular}

\vspace{0.5cm}


\begin{tabular}{p{2cm} p{2cm} p{8cm}}
	\multicolumn{3}{l}{\textbf{Outputs:}}\\
	\hline
	#5
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1cm}

\textbf{Formula:} #6
\bigskip

\textbf{Source:} #7 \bigskip

\textbf{References:}  #8

\pagebreak

}
